title: font identification
content:
What is the type use here?  
it looks like futura caps but it's not.

[http://www.fulltable.com/iso/rm/imm/05.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817100909/http:/www.fulltable.com/iso/rm/imm/05.jpg "http://www.fulltable.com/iso/rm/imm/05.jpg")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817100909im_/http:/typophile.com/files/05_4164.jpg)
author: dinobib

comments.content:
in fact "survey graphic" is set in futura but the rest of the text don't  
I'am looking for the type used to write "surveying the shape of things to come"

I'm stupid to haven't recognize it, the Y form was looking strange for me  
Thanks
Interesting. They saw Futura as a display font and Kabel as text. I would've thought the reverse. Or perhaps those are the sizes they had.
